tool_description: This is api for the Bhagavad Gita book. A Hindu scripture.
name: Bhagavad Gita_v3
title: Bhagavad Gita

api_list.name: Get all chapters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bhagavad-gita5.p.rapidapi.com/gita/chapters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bhagavad-gita5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bhagavad-gita5.p.rapidapi.com/gita/chapters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bhagavad-gita5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
